[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [PoiManager](./harp-mapview.poimanager.md) &gt; [addPois](./harp-mapview.poimanager.addpois.md)

## PoiManager.addPois() method

Add all POIs from a decoded tile and store them as \[\[TextElement\]\]s in the \[\[Tile\]\].

Also handles LineMarkers, which is a recurring marker along a line (road).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addPois(tile: Tile, decodedTile: DecodedTile): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tile | [Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md) | Tile to add POIs to. |
|  decodedTile | [DecodedTile](./harp-datasource-protocol.decodedtile.md) | DecodedTile containing the raw \[\[PoiGeometry\]\] objects describing the POIs. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
